definition: definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

pinyin: Sa4 da2 mu3 · Hou2 sai4 yin1

definition: Franco (name)/Generalissimo Francisco Franco Bahamonde (1892-1975), Spanish dictator and head of state 1939-1975
Suharto (1921-2008), former Indonesian general, president of the Republic of Indonesia 1967-1998
Yeltsin (name)/Boris Yeltsin (1931-2007) first post-communist president of Russia 1991-1999
Robert Mugabe (1924-), Zimbabwean ZANU-PF politician, president of Zimbabwe 1987-2017
Benito Mussolini (1883-1945), Italian fascist dictator, "Il Duce", president 1922-1943
(Colonel Muammar) Gaddafi (1942-2011), de facto leader of Libya from 1969-2011
Gorbachev/Mikhail Sergeyevich Gorbachev (1931-), last president of the Soviet Union 1991-1995
Jacobin club, French revolutionary party that played a leading role in the reign of terror 1791-1794
Castro (name)/Fidel Castro or Fidel Alejandro Castro Ruz (1926-), Cuban revolutionary leader, prime minister 1959-1976, president 1976-2008
